tool_description: Real-time price, product, seller, review data from Amazon US, DE, UK, etc. API returns product title, manufacturer, reviews, size selection, retail price and much more.For private plans with higher request amounts and concurrency, custom integration or additional features contact us via support@crawler2api.com.
name: Amazon merchant data
title: Amazon merchant data

api_list.name: Get ASIN by GTIN
api_list.description: Search product by GTIN - Global Trade Item Number (e.g. 0194252099537) and get an ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number). Use ASIN for further searches.

api_list.name: Search offers by ASIN
api_list.description: Search Amazon by ASIN and return offers with prices.

api_list.name: Get product reviews
api_list.description: Search reviews by ASIN and country

api_list.name: Search products by term
api_list.description: Search by term (e.g. iphone 12) and get results

api_list.name: Search product by ASIN
api_list.description: Search product by a marketplace product id (Amazon ASIN, e.g. B09G98X7GV). A successful response returns product details.
